    I am

    a PhD student under Prof. C. V Jawahar at IIIT Hyderabad. My PhD is partly funded by TCS through the TCS Research fellowship Scheme 2016. I joined the Phd Program in 2015 after completing MS by Research [2013-2015] in Computer Science under Prof. Jawahar’s guidance. Prior to joining IIIT Hyderabad, I had obtained my undergraduate degree in Btech Computer Science Engineering from NIT Warangal [2005-2009] and worked with S&P Global Market Intelligence as a Business Analyst .

    My research is in the field of Computer Vision and Machine Learning. Specifically, I look into the problems of OCR in Indian languages, Scene text understanding and Document Visual Question Answering (DocVQA)

    Academic Services

    • Reviewer for Conferences - WACV 2021,2022, ICDAR 2021, ICCV 2021
    • Reviwer for jounrals - Pattern Recognition, IEEE TNNLS, TPAMI, Visual Computer
    • [2021] Organizer, Document Visual Question Answering Workshop, ICDAR 2021
    • [2021] Organizer, DocVQA competition, ICDAR 2021
    • [2020] Organizer, DocVQA competition, CVPR 2020
    • [2020] Organizer and Competition Chair, Text and Documents Workshop , CVPR 2020
    • [2019] Organizer, Scene Text VQA Competition, ICDAR 2019

    Awards/ Achievements
